text: The Ten Commandments Monument is installed on the Texas State Capitol grounds in Austin, Texas, United States. The Texas Sunset Red Granite artwork was designed by an unknown artist and erected by the Fraternal Order of Eagles of Texas in 1961. It was the subject of litigation in the Supreme Court case Van Orden v. Perry (2005). ==See also== * 1961 in art * Ten Commandments Monument (Little Rock, Arkansas) * Ten Commandments Monument (Oklahoma City) ==References== ==External links== * Category:1961 establishments in Texas Category:1961 sculptures Category:Granite sculptures in Texas Category:Monuments and memorials in Texas Category:Outdoor sculptures in Austin, Texas Category:Ten Commandments
title: Ten Commandments Monument (Austin, Texas)
